name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski

Proficient in **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **CI/CD**, and **Infrastructure-as-Code**, ensuring robust security automation aligned with compliance standards such as PCI DSS and GDPR. My background includes developing full-stack solutions using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, coupled with expertise in **FastAPI** and **Django** for backend services. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with microservices architecture and MLOps workflows, utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow** to deliver intelligent automation and predictive analytics solutions.
